__e: We've sent Toby and your mother away with that man, Klaus, and we don't know the first thing about him.
Klaus and I are on one team, and you two are on the other.
Is it because I know Klaus and part of you must still blame him?
Klaus ain't here, and Cami, well, she's got this thing about people telling her what she can and can't do.
What we're doing is nothing Klaus hasn't done to both you and your brother a dozen times over.
Klaus isn't the only thing we need to be afraid of.
